claim: Planet of the Apes was based on Pierre Boulle's 1963 science fiction novel of the same name.
premise_source_doc_sentence: La Planète des Singes , known in English as Planet of the Apes and Monkey Planet , is a 1963 science fiction novel by French author Pierre Boulle .

claim: Planet of the Apes was based on Pierre Boulle's 1963 science fiction novel of the same name.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The screenplay by Michael Wilson and Rod Serling was loosely based on the 1963 French novel La Planète des Singes by Pierre Boulle .

claim: Planet of the Apes was based on Pierre Boulle's 1963 science fiction novel of the same name.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The series began with French author Pierre Boulle 's 1963 novel La Planète des Singes , translated into English as Planet of the Apes or Monkey Planet .
